title: Reminiscences of Yarrow. Edited and annotated by ... Professor Veitch, LL.D. Illustrated by Tom Scott ... Second edition
author: Russell, James
snippet: My father was appointed Chaplain to the LordHigh Commissioner in 1805, by Francis, LordNapier,1 his friend and patron in Ettrick, on theresignation of that post by the Rev. Dr Martin,minister of Monimail, who had been Chaplain tothe former Commissioner, Lord Leven.
